title: Jilly-Bean
description: Temperatures are rising and superstition reigns supreme!Eighteen year old Jillian Crossland has her life planned out. Or so she thinks!Despite her better judgement, a s√©ance one evening sets a blueprint for disaster when fate steps in and shakes up her plans and her life!Jilly-Bean is a novel that explores contemporary life in the throes of global warming and on the edge of madness.
author: Celia Vogel
